summary: All requirements have been implemented. The meditation course has been added with 18+ age group, all course descriptions updated with duration details, and the meditation course has a unique image assigned. Frontend displays duration information consistently across all views.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) implementing data migration logic
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify the need for a migration system or migration module. This appears to be an implementation detail added beyond the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: The meditation course has a 21-day duration instead of any specific duration mentioned in requirements
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 does not specify the duration for the meditation course. The implementation chose 21 days, which was not requested.
